messages.subject: Health Insurance for unschooler that is about to turn 20
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/14/02 1:18:49 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/14/02 1:18:49 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
I think chucking a kid out of the house at a certain age to make it on
their own is something like throwing a kid in the water so he'll learn to
swim. >>

Amen Tia.
Wise words indeed. He obviously needs to figure out who he is, what he wants
to do with himself before he can get focused again. School has done it's
damage, it's time to let that be undone as gently as possible.

Ren
